title: India PM Modi Urges People to Get Out and Vote for His Party Despite Staggering Pandemic and Piles of Bodies
content:
1. India PM Modi Urges People to Get Out and Vote for His Party Despite Staggering Pandemic and Piles of Bodies  The Daily Beast
  2. How Did India's COVID-19 Crisis Become a Catastrophe?  TIME
  3. As Covid-19 Cases Surge in India, Modi’s Party Is Poised for Gains  The Wall Street Journal
  4. Arundhati Roy on India's Covid catastrophe: 'We are witnessing a crime against humanity'  The Guardian
  5. Lessons from India’s COVID-19 tsunami  INQUIRER.net
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: インドのモディ首相、パンデミックと死体の山にもかかわらず、国民に自党への投票を呼びかける
印度总理莫迪敦促人们走出家门，为他的政党投票，尽管大流行病和尸体堆积如山
印度總理莫迪敦促人們走出家門，爲他的政黨投票，儘管大流行病和屍體堆積如山
